trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件更新记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这允许您提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码之前更新数据源中发生此事件时的某个记录的值。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DetailsViewUpdateEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
